home_info_1: I first embarked on the path as a self-taught developer, developing an e-commerce application for a local firm in Vietnam.
home_info_2: I moved to the United States to pursue software engineering at Worcester Polytechnic Institute.
home_info_3: I journeyed to the tech hubs of Hangzhou, China to investigate high-technology recruitment and development.
home_info_4: I completed a software engineering contract at NVIDIA.
contact_message_placeholder: Let me know how I can be of service!
about_bio: I'm a dedicated and detail-focused software engineer with 5 years of hands-on experience in full-stack web development, systems software engineering, and technical internships. With a strong foundation in languages like Java, Python, C, and C++, I love tackling challenges both in web-development and at the system level. From creating sleek user interfaces to optimizing back-end performance, I'm passionate about building software solutions that are both efficient and user-friendly.

about_exp_company_1_desc_2: Developed proof-of-concept React modules for a GUI to improve user-experience.
about_exp_company_1_desc_3: Collaborated on updating build profile variants to optimize display performance and expand error reporting.

about_exp_company_2_desc_3: Created reusable chart components and data filtering systems.
about_exp_company_2_desc_4: Implemented responsive visualization tools supporting cross-platform accessibility and export functionality.

about_exp_company_3_desc_2: Integrated Aurora Solar and Google Project Sunroof APIs with React, creating a unified solar panel mapping interface.
